results.title: Metformin: Experimental and Clinical Evidence for a Potential Role in Emphysema Treatment.
results.journal: Am J Respir Crit Care Med
results.text_hl: Objectives: We sought to investigate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may ameliorate CS-induced pathologies of @<m>DISEASE_Emphysematous_Cholecystitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D041882 @@@emphysematous@@@ @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@chronic obstructive pulmonary disease@@@ (@DISEASE_Pulmonary_Disease_Chronic_Obstructive @DISEASE_MESH:D029424 @@@COPD@@@).

results.title: AMP-activated protein kinase reduces inflammatory responses and cellular senescence in pulmonary emphysema
results.text_hl: Furthermore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ prophylactically protected against but Compound C further reduced mitochondrial proteins @GENE_SOD2 @GENE_6648 @@@SOD2@@@ and @GENE_SIRT3 @GENE_23410 @@@SIRT3@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Emphysematous_Cholecystitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D041882 @@@emphysematous lungs@@@.
